articles.title: Why You Endlessly Scroll Through Your Phone, and How to Stop - CNET
articles.description: Commentary: I ask experts for tips on reducing screen time -- and curbing my TikTok addiction.
articles.content: Lately, I've developed a habit I'm not proud of. Whenever I feel overwhelmed or anxious, my immediate instinct is to reach for my phone, open up TikTok and find solace in mindless videos offering com… [+10521 chars]
